body.name: Netgear Nighthawk M6 Pro 5G Wi-Fi 6E Mobile Hotspot Router Unlocked
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 23 mins.
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 1 hr 23 mins.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 2.8" color touch LCD panel, 5040mAh battery, Chipset: Qualcomm SD X65, Guest WiFi privacy separation
5G: mmWave and Sub-6 Bands, Wi-Fi: AXE3600 max throughput (PHY), 2.9Gbps on 5GHz/6GHz, 700Mbps on 2.4GHz, WiFi 6E, up to 3.6Gbps, Devices: up to 32, Ethernet: 2.5G port
Router uses Nano SIM Card for Hotspot Services. (No sim card or Services included).

AT&T Unlocked Version. Compatible with Most GSM and CDMA Carriers like AT&T, T-Mobile, MetroPCS, etc. Will Also work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Sprint. Get a Data only plan from your desired Carrier, insert SIM in the Device and enjoy 5G / 4G LTE Cellular coverage anywhere your phone gets service.
body.description: Nighthawk M6 Pro 5G: mmWave and Sub-6 Bands WiFi: WiFi 6E, up to 3.6Gbps Devices: up to 32 Ethernet: 2.5G port Maximize your mobile WiFi experience to unparalleled heights with WiFi 6E coupled with incredible new mmWave 5G speeds. The Nighthawk M6 Pro Mobile Router is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon X65 5G Modem-RF System to deliver premium performance and groundbreaking speeds. This mobile router supports 2.4GHz, 5GHz, and 6GHz with AXE3600, making it an ideal device to enable secure WiFi on the go for up to 32 devices simultaneously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars decent and good signal
reviews.reviewText: We had the model prior to this and it buffered the entire time. This model rarely buffers and I feel like it covers slightly more area than the last one. However I live in an 1100 sq ft house and unless it's in the center it will not cover the livingroom and the back bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work on Verizon.
reviews.reviewText: Although it is listed as unlocked and usable on Verizon, I had a horrible experience with it. After multiple attempts with Netgear I returned the first one and replaced it with annother. Same problem. Finally I got a response from Netgear that explained the problem. Here is what they said. " AT&T M6 does not support Verizon bands.Furthermore, they also have different CA and EN-DC support. If these are not configured based on the network capability, it will significantly impact the device's performance."Don't get it unless you plan to use it on AT&T.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Bought a pre-owned device and it arrived in excellent condition. A couple months in now, I have used it on both AT&T and T-Mobile, and it works on both so the unlock state is verified even with an "AT&T" logo on the front of the unit. The hotspot is more reliable and much faster than the hotspot feature on my iPhone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not setup to work on Verizon network
reviews.reviewText: I was really hoping this MiFi would be able to cover the areas where there is little internet access. Problem was it isn't Verizon compatible even though the listing says it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It arrived as expected
reviews.reviewText: The issue we are having is it will just disconnect, we are having to re start it, other than that it is not to bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with Verizon
reviews.reviewText: Have an already activated sim card through verizon with their data plan (may need a cheap 4g lte device registered on your account first) then just the sim to this device!Used for my car and havent had any issues.Removed the battery out of the device and connected it to my power source that powers my dashcam while the vehicle is off so i get on the cloud uploading until the battery dies and then also the dual band allows me to simultaneously use 5g and 2.4g signal for all devices

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Unlocked but you loose updates
reviews.reviewText: Purchased an unlocked unit. Originally from AT&T but unlocked and works on T-Mobile and other providers. The big issue is if you don't have an AT&T account, there is no way to get firmware updates or even technical support. Use the unit in the unlocked mode on a different provider and you are left out in the cold.This lack of support and / or future firmware updates is leaving me very concerned and considering returning the unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Slowest WiFi for the highest price😬
reviews.reviewText: I went to Walmart and bought a cheap 50$ AT&T router and it was weak so I bought this one as a faster better option and we literally can’t do anything online while connected to this wifi.. it’s super slow and I cud t get it to even work for a while but after some research I got it connected and working but it’s so slow I can’t use it
